description:
Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato, the self-proclaimed Oden, finally meets his son Momonosuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
Ich werde dich beschützen – Yamato und Momonosukes Zusammenkunft
Je te protégerai ! Yamato rencontre Momonosuké
Kimi o Mamoru: Kaikou Yamato to Momonosuke
Я тебя защищу! Ямато встречает Момоноскэ!
君を守る 邂逅ヤマトとモモの助
